mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select t.movie_time_code, m.movie_name, m.movie_code, tt.theater_code, tt.theater_name, sc.screen_code, sc.screen_name, t.movie_start_time, t.movie_end_time, sc.screen_total_seat, sc.screen_seat_row, sc.screen_seat_col from tbl_movie_time t, tbl_movie m, tbl_movie_schedule d, tbl_theater tt, tbl_movie_screen sc where m.movie_code = d.movie_code and d.movie_schedule_code = t.movie_schedule_code and tt.theater_code = d.theater_code and t.screen_code = sc.screen_code and t.movie_end_time >= sysdate
and movie_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and theater_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by t.movie_end_time desc) a) where rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}
select count(*) from tbl_movie_time where movie_end_time >= sysdate

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select t.movie_time_code, m.movie_name, m.movie_code, tt.theater_code, tt.theater_name, sc.screen_code, sc.screen_name, t.movie_start_time, t.movie_end_time, sc.screen_total_seat, sc.screen_seat_row, sc.screen_seat_col from tbl_movie_time t, tbl_movie m, tbl_movie_schedule d, tbl_theater tt, tbl_movie_screen sc where m.movie_code = d.movie_code and d.movie_schedule_code = t.movie_schedule_code and tt.theater_code = d.theater_code and t.screen_code = sc.screen_code and t.movie_end_time <= sysdate) a) where rnum between #{start_row} and #{end_row}
select count(*) from tbl_movie_time where movie_end_time <= sysdate

select t.movie_time_code, m.movie_name, m.movie_code, tt.theater_code, tt.theater_name, sc.screen_code, sc.screen_name, t.movie_start_time, t.movie_end_time, sc.screen_total_seat, a.*, sc.screen_seat_row, sc.screen_seat_col from tbl_movie_time t, tbl_movie m, tbl_movie_schedule d, tbl_theater tt, tbl_movie_screen sc, (select count(*) seat_check_cnt from tbl_schedule_seat where movie_time_code = #{movie_time_code} and seat_check = 'N') a where m.movie_code = d.movie_code and d.movie_schedule_code = t.movie_schedule_code and tt.theater_code = d.theater_code and t.screen_code = sc.screen_code and t.movie_time_code = #{movie_time_code}

select ss.schedule_seat_code, s.movie_seat_num, s.seat_code, ss.seat_check, t.screen_code, ss.movie_time_code from tbl_schedule_seat ss, tbl_movie_time t, tbl_movie_seat s where ss.movie_time_code = t.movie_time_code and ss.movie_seat_num = s.movie_seat_num and ss.movie_time_code = #{movie_time_code} and ss.seat_check = 'Y'
